_description: On the decay of the English language in Ireland — one 6-line stanza in the Albus liber Scacarii, Dublin

LamCarew617.Transcription:
By granting charters of peaceTo false English without leaseThis
                    land shallbe much vndooBut Goshpride and alserage[?]And loosinge
                    of our languageHaue mickle holpe thertoo
LamCarew617.Note:
Seventeenth-century copy of early fifteenth-century
                    accounts.
